title: 820-4924 no keyboard no trackpad
message:
Tried replacing the trackpad cable, then the trackpad is working, but the keyboard still doesnt work, I have tried replacing with good known trackpad cable, still doesnt work.
But, when I try to reset smc, it work, any idea ? no visible liquid damage

title: 820-4924 no keyboard no trackpad
message:
TP works all the time?
Check TP and KB before login to OSX.
Inspect U4820/30 area for corrosion.
Check if all resistors are good.

title: 820-4924 no keyboard no trackpad
message:
yeah trackpad work all the time
there's no visible corrosion at u4820/30, 
but r4830 resistance is low ( it should be 100k ), tried replacing it, now its 90k, still doenst work
before login, the trackpad can move and click normally, keyboard still doesnt work ( when i press alt with os x pendrive, its doesnt work )

title: 820-4924 no keyboard no trackpad
message: i have tried on good known assembly of trackpad and the tp cable, im sure its not the part problem

title: 820-4924 no keyboard no trackpad
message:
Keyboard communicates with PCH through trackpad circuitry.
If you are really sure already tested known good trackpad board and flex at same time, then change U4820/30.
One of them can be bad and blocks I2C bus.
